title: Can’t find that file? These advanced Windows Search tips can help
description:
Let’s face it: Searching your PC for files within Windows has always been mildly confusing, especially with several options for searching right within Windows 10 and 11. But if you’re convinced that a particular file is hidden somewhere on your PC, try these tips to find it and get back to work.

title: Best early October Prime Day computer deals
description:
Amazon’s next sales event, Prime Early Access Sale, will run between October 11th and 12th. This smaller version of Prime Day should include great deals on everything from gaming PCs to all-in-ones, as well as more traditional desktop machines.

title: Laptop deals: Best early October Prime Day discounts
description:
If you’re in the market for a new laptop, and you missed finding a deal during July’s Prime Day event, you’re in luck. Amazon is running a new sales event called Prime Early Access Sale that will run between Oct 11 and 12. This low-key version of Prime Day should include great deals on laptops from Dell, Microsoft, and other top brands.

title: Dash cam deals: Early October Prime Day discounts
description: Are you looking for a second set of eyes to help you on the road? Now is a great time to buy a dash cam for piece of mind. Amazon’s next sales event, Prime Early Access Sale, will run between October 11th and 12th. What many people are calling “October Prime Day” should include great deals on everything from 4K front and rearview sets to mini-cams, and more.</
